exceptions.tactic: intros X q p HdecP HdecQ.
intros X' q p HdecP HdecQ.
intros X' q' p HdecP HdecQ.
intros X' q' p' HdecP HdecQ.

original: intros X q p HdecP HdecQ. unfold decidable in HdecP, HdecQ. destruct HdecP as [fP HP], HdecQ as [fQ HQ]. exists (fun x : X => orb (fP x) (fQ x)). intros x. specialize (HP x). specialize (HQ x). destruct (fP x), (fQ x); firstorder.
